wecom_not_complete_bind_content.zh_CN: 空间站主管理员尚未完成企业微信绑定，请联系主管理员
wecom_not_complete_bind_content.en_US: The master administrator of the space has not completed the binding of enterprise wechat, please contact the master administrator

wecom_org_manage_reject_msg.zh_CN: 正通过企业微信集成管理通讯录，如需邀请成员请前往企业微信管理后台 如何邀请？
wecom_org_manage_reject_msg.en_US: This Space's contacts are managed by the WeCom integration. Please go to the WeCom admin backend to invite members. How to invite？

wecom_social_deactivate_tip.zh_CN: 如需停用应用，请前往「企业微信管理后台 > 应用管理 > 维格表 > 删除应用」
wecom_social_deactivate_tip.en_US: If you need to disable the application, please go to WeCom Admin Panel -> Applications -> 维格表 -> Delete application.

wecom_subscribed_record_cell_updated_tit.en_US: Someone has changed the record you are watching in

wecom_subscribed_record_commented_title.zh_CN: 关注的记录有一条新评论
wecom_subscribed_record_commented_title.en_US: The record you are watching received a new comment

wecom_sync_address_error.zh_CN: 你已被移出企业微信应用可见范围，同步通讯录将使空间站缺失主管理员，请更换主管理员后再同步通讯录
wecom_sync_address_error.en_US: You have been removed from the visible range of wecom application. Synchronizing the address book will cause the space station to lose the master administrator. Please change the master administrator and synchronize the address book again

wecom_upgrade_guidance.zh_CN:
想要升级空间站或续费时长吗？
请前往企业微信企业管理后台进行购买，如需帮助可联系维格表客服。
wecom_upgrade_guidance.en_US:
Want to upgrade or renew your plan?
Please go to WeCom Admin Panel to make a subscription. You also can contact our customer service staff if you need help.

weixin_share_card_desc.zh_CN: 一款最近很火的生产力工具，我也在用，墙裂推荐给你～

weixin_share_card_title.zh_CN: vika维格表，百强企业都说好

welcome_sub_title1.zh_CN: 观看 vika维格课堂，快速了解维格表
welcome_sub_title1.en_US: Watch videos to learn about vikadata

welcome_sub_title2.zh_CN: 从模板学习，激发创作灵感

welcome_sub_title3.zh_CN: 前往帮助中心，学习更多使用技巧

welcome_workspace_tip1.zh_CN: 你可以快速创建一个维格表，开启维格旅程
welcome_workspace_tip1.en_US: You can create a datasheet in a blink and start the journey with us!

welcome_workspace_tip2.zh_CN: 欢迎来到维格表，开始体验「积木式多媒体数据表格」
welcome_workspace_tip2.en_US: Welcome to vikadata, let's start our journey to "building blocks-like multimedia database-spreadsheet hybrid"!

whether_bind_with_invited_email.zh_CN: 是否与被邀请帐号${inviteEmail}绑定
whether_bind_with_invited_email.en_US: Confirm whether to bind with the invited account ${inviteEmail}

widget_center_create_modal_desc.zh_CN: 首先为你的小程序取个名字，然后选择从哪个小程序模板开始开发 了解更多
widget_center_create_modal_desc.en_US: First give your widget a name, and then choose which component template to start developing < a href = "" /> learn more

widget_center_create_modal_widget_agreem.zh_CN: 我已阅读并同意<a href="">《维格表开发者协议》
widget_center_create_modal_widget_agreem.en_US: I have read and agreed to the <a href = ""> "wig watch developer agreement"

widget_center_install_modal_content.zh_CN: 自建小程序可能会读取或写入表格数据，请确认已知风险后再安装使用。
widget_center_install_modal_content.en_US: Custom widgets may read from or write to the datasheet. Please be aware of the risks before installing the widget.

widget_center_official_introduction.zh_CN: 官方推荐的小程序由官方认证的开发者发布，所有空间站皆可安装使用
widget_center_official_introduction.en_US: Recommended widgets are published by officially certified developers and can be installed in all Spaces

widget_center_space_introduction.zh_CN: 自建小程序由当前空间站的成员开发并发布，仅可在当前空间站安装使用
widget_center_space_introduction.en_US: Custom widgets are developed and published by your Space member and can be installed only in this Space

widget_cli_upgrade_tip.zh_CN: 你当前的 widget-cli 工具版本过低，请前往终端重新执行 npm i -g @vikadata/widget-cli 命令以升级工具
widget_cli_upgrade_tip.en_US: Your widget-cli tool has a low version. Please execute "npm i -g @vikadata/widget-cli" in your terminal to upgrade it.

widget_connect_error.zh_CN: 无法连接到你的本地小程序，请确认地址无误，或者确认 widget-cli 工具已是最新版
widget_connect_error.en_US: Unable to connect to your local widget. Please make sure the address is correct

widget_cret_invalid_error_content.zh_CN:
1. 在浏览器中打开 chrome://flags/#allow-insecure-localhost

2. 将高亮选项的设置从 Disabled 改为 Enabled

3. 重启浏览器，使新的配置生效
widget_cret_invalid_error_content.en_US:
1. Open "chrome://flags/#allow-insecure-localhost" in your browser

2. Change the highlighted option from "Disabled" to "Enabled"

3. Restart the browser to make the new configuration take effect

widget_cret_invalid_error_title.zh_CN: 请先解除浏览器对于加载本地代码的安全限制
widget_cret_invalid_error_title.en_US: Please disable your browser's security restrictions on loading local code

widget_dev_config_content.zh_CN: 请先前往你的小程序文件夹，执行${startCmd}命令，将返回的小程序开发地址粘贴到下方
widget_dev_config_content.en_US: Please go to the project folder of your widget first, then execute the ${startCmd} command, and paste the returned URL below

widget_dev_url_input_placeholder.zh_CN: 请填写本地服务的 URL 地址
widget_dev_url_input_placeholder.en_US: Please fill in the URL returned from the terminal

widget_filter_tips.zh_CN: 被筛选过滤的数据不会被小程序读取
widget_filter_tips.en_US: Filtered data is not read by widget

widget_has_be_delete.zh_CN: 该小程序已被删除，无法查看

widget_import_from_airtable_done.zh_CN: Airtable 数据导入成功，本次共导入 ${ROW_NUM} 行数据
widget_import_from_airtable_done.en_US: Airtable data is successfully imported, included $ {ROW_NUM} records

widget_import_from_airtable_start_import.zh_CN: 点击下方按钮或展开小程序即可开始导入Airtable 数据
widget_import_from_airtable_start_import.en_US: Click the button or expand the widget to start import

widget_import_from_airtable_step_1_title.zh_CN: 1. 请前往 Airtable 获取下方参数信息
widget_import_from_airtable_step_1_title.en_US: 1. Please enter the required information from airtable

widget_import_from_airtable_step_1_warni.zh_CN: 请确认填写内容正确后重试
widget_import_from_airtable_step_1_warni.en_US: Please confirm that the content of the filling is correct

widget_import_from_airtable_step_3_descr.zh_CN: 正在从 Airtable 导入数据……

widget_load_error.zh_CN: ⁣已与服务器断开连接，请重新执行 widget-cli start 命令，点击右上角的刷新后，即可继续开发
widget_load_error.en_US: Disconnected from the server, please re-execute the "widget-cli start" command, then refresh the widget to continue development

widget_load_error_ban_content.zh_CN: 该小程序违反相关条约已被封禁暂时无法使用
widget_load_error_ban_content.en_US: The widget violates relevant treaties and has been banned and temporarily unavailable

widget_load_error_load_error.zh_CN: 已与服务器断开连接，请重新执行 widget-cli start 命令，刷新后即可继续开发
widget_load_error_load_error.en_US: Disconnected from the server, please re-execute the "widget-cli start" command, then refresh the widget to continue development

widget_load_error_not_match.zh_CN: 本地小程序包 ID 与当前小程序面板的小程序包 ID 不一致，请确认你没有修改本地代码中的 packageId 参数值
widget_load_error_not_match.en_US: The local component package ID is inconsistent with the component package ID of the current component board. Please confirm that you have not modified the parameter value of packageId in the local code

widget_load_error_published.zh_CN: 请联系该小程序发布者 @${authorName} 排查问题
widget_load_error_published.en_US: Please contact the widget publisher @${authorName} for troubleshooting

widget_load_error_title.en_US: Error occurred when running the widget

widget_load_url_error_not_match.zh_CN: 无法连接到本地小程序，请排查代码是否有错误，或者确认代码中的 packageId 与当前小程序的包 ID (${widgetPackageId}) 保持一致
widget_load_url_error_not_match.en_US: Unable to connect to the local widget, please check if there are any errors in your code, or make sure the packageId in your code is "${widgetPackageId}"

widget_loader_developing_content.zh_CN: 你可以点击下面按钮继续开发
widget_loader_developing_content.en_US: Click the button below to continue development

widget_loader_error_cret_invalid.zh_CN: 请先解除浏览器对于加载本地代码的安全限制，否则小程序无法顺利加载
widget_loader_error_cret_invalid.en_US: Please first release the browser's security restrictions on loading local code, otherwise the widget cannot be loaded smoothly

widget_name_length_error.zh_CN: 小程序的名称在 1~30 个字符之间
widget_name_length_error.en_US: The name must be between 1 and 30 characters in length

widget_no_access_datasheet.zh_CN: 无权限访问关联表的数据
widget_no_access_datasheet.en_US: No permission to access the data

widget_panel_count_limit.zh_CN: 小程序面板数量达到上限
widget_panel_count_limit.en_US: This datasheet has the maximum number of widget boards.

widget_publish_help_desc.zh_CN: 发布成功后，空间站成员即可在小程序中心安装此小程序
widget_publish_help_desc.en_US: After the widget is published, members in your Space can install it in the Widget Center

widget_publish_help_step1.zh_CN: 1、开发完成并预览无误后，先在终端输入 ${cmd} 退出运行状态
widget_publish_help_step1.en_US: 1. After you've finished development and make sure the preview is correct, tap ${cmd} in the terminal

widget_publish_help_step2.en_US: 2. Then execute the following command to publish:

widget_publish_modal_content.zh_CN: 在终端执行完 release 命令后的结果 + 在小程序中心出现发布后的小程序
widget_publish_modal_content.en_US: The result after the release command is executed on the terminal + the released widget appears in the component center

widget_something_went_wrong.zh_CN: 发生了未知错误，请刷新重试

widget_step_dev_desc.zh_CN: 通过本地服务的 URL 地址，你可以动态查看小程序的效果
widget_step_dev_desc.en_US: With the URL address of the local service, you can preview the widget in real time

widget_step_init_content_desc.zh_CN: 注意：该命令会要求输入你的 API Token 和空间站 ID 如何获取
widget_step_init_content_desc.en_US: Note: this command will ask you to enter your API token and space station ID < a > how to get it

widget_step_init_content_label.zh_CN: 在终端中继续执行下列命令：

widget_step_init_desc.zh_CN: 认证你的开发者身份，并创建小程序的项目文件
widget_step_init_desc.en_US: Verify your developer identity and create project files for your new widget

widget_step_install_content_label1.en_US: 1. Open the terminal on your computer

widget_step_install_content_label2.en_US: 2. Execute the following command in the terminal

widget_step_install_desc.zh_CN: 小程序开发工具可以用来初始化、运行、发布、下架小程序
widget_step_install_desc.en_US: You can use the widget CLI  tool to initialize, run, publish, and unpublish widgets

widget_step_start_content_desc2.zh_CN: 注意：该命令会生成一个 URL，供下一步使用
widget_step_start_content_desc2.en_US: Note: this command will generate a URL that will be used in the next step

widget_step_start_content_label1.zh_CN: 1、前往小程序的项目文件夹，开始开发
widget_step_start_content_label1.en_US: 1. Go to the project folder of the new widget and start development:

widget_step_start_content_label2.zh_CN: 2、开发完毕后，在终端中执行下列命令，运行小程序
widget_step_start_content_label2.en_US: 2. After development, execute the following command to start the widget

widget_step_start_desc.zh_CN: 跟随下列步骤，启动小程序的本地服务，进入开发模式
widget_step_start_desc.en_US: Follow the steps below to start the widget's local service and enter development mode

widget_transfer_modal_content.zh_CN:
• 当前发布者：${oldOwner}

    该成员不能再通过命令行工具进行小程序的发布、下架等操作

  • 新的发布者：${newOwner}

    该成员能够通过命令行工具进行该小程序的发布、下架等操作
widget_transfer_modal_content.en_US:
• Current publisher: ${oldOwner}

    The member can no longer publish or unpublish the widget in the Widget Center via the CLI tool.

  • New publisher: ${newOwner}

    The member can publish and unpublish the widget in the Widget Center via the CLI tool.

widget_unpublish_modal_content.en_US: Are you sure to unpublish the widget?

width_limit_waring.zh_CN: 已超过首列最大列宽限制，此次列宽调整不会生效
width_limit_waring.en_US: The maximum column width limit of the first column has been reached so the adjustment will not take effect

wizard_14_success_message.zh_CN: 已获得 V 币奖励

wizard_15_success_message.zh_CN: 已获得 V 币奖励

wizard_16_success_message.zh_CN: 已获得 V 币奖励

wizard_17_success_message.zh_CN: 已获得 V 币奖励

wizard_18_success_message.zh_CN: 已获得 V 币奖励

wizard_20_success_message.zh_CN: 已获得 V 币奖励

workbench_instruction_of_all_member_sett.zh_CN: 你拥有工作台的最高权限，可以在工作台对文件进行以下的权限设置
workbench_instruction_of_all_member_sett.en_US: Controls what can do and what can't do from the workbench

workbench_setting_cannot_export_datashee.zh_CN: 当成员拥有文件的管理权限时，可以将工作台的维格表导出到本地
workbench_setting_cannot_export_datashee.en_US: If turn on, datasheets of the workbench can be imported to local computer when member has the permission of the files.

workbench_setting_cannot_export_datashee.zh_CN: 拥有文件管理权限的成员可以导出文件到本地
workbench_setting_cannot_export_datashee.en_US: If members have the "manageable" permission to a datasheet, they can export it to a local file.

workbench_setting_show_watermark_tips.zh_CN: 为了保证企业信息安全，工作台和通讯录支持显示全局水印。水印内容为当前访问成员的姓名+手机号后缀或者邮箱前缀，防止截屏泄密。
workbench_setting_show_watermark_tips.en_US: The workbench and the contacts support watermarks to prevent members from leaking enterprise information. A watermark includes the name and phone number suffix/email prefix.

your_account_will_destroy_at.zh_CN: 你的账号将会在 ${time} 正式销毁
your_account_will_destroy_at.en_US: Your account will be deleted at ${time}
